name: The Good Life by Brian Desind 2nd Ed. (JC Newman)
additionalNotes:
https://privadacigarclub.com/shop/the-good-life-by-brian-desind-j-c-newman/

This one was intended to be the same as the first edition, however the 2nd Edition came out somewhat differently according to Brian Desind, owner of Privada CC, who emailed me this comment: "So a bit of background on this! the first version was made in 2019, and the new version was made quite recently. On paper, the wrappers are the same leaf, CT Broadleaf, but the age significantly altered the leaf because of just natural variation in aging that happened during the process, so the wrapper used for the re-release seems like quite a different experience, despite being the same type of leaf. So even though they seem like the same components, the overall experience is quite different."
